alert.note: Alert for Coffee; Jeff Davis (Georgia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Jacksonville (Northeast Florida and Southeast Georgia)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 13 at 3:47PM EDT by NWS Jacksonville
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of Coffee and southwestern Jeff Davis Counties through 445 PM EDT... At 346 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from 11 miles south of Rochelle to near Mystic. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 45 to 55 mph and nickel size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Douglas, Broxton, Ambrose, Nicholls, Pridgen, West Green, Snipesville and Denton. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.88 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. These storms may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
